components.name: DC Motor (Rotary)
components.description: A motor that converts electrical energy into mechanical motion, often used in robotics and automation.

components.name: Servo Motor (Position Control)
components.description: A motor that provides precise control of angular position, ideal for applications requiring specific positioning.

components.name: Water Pump (Submersible)
components.description: A device designed to move water, commonly used in irrigation systems and aquariums.
components.range: Pumps water at a rate of 120-300 liters per hour

components.name: Photoresistor (Light Sensor)
components.description: A light-sensitive resistor that changes resistance based on light intensity, useful for light detection.
components.range: Detects light levels from 0 to 1000 lux
components.application: Ambient light sensing, automatic lighting systems

components.name: Ultrasonic Sensor (Distance Measuring)
components.description: A sensor that measures distance by emitting ultrasonic waves and measuring their reflection time.
components.application: Obstacle avoidance in robotics, distance measurement

components.name: Stepper Motor (Precision Control)
components.description: A motor that moves in discrete steps, allowing for precise control of position and speed, commonly used in CNC machines.
components.range: 1.8 degrees per step (200 steps per revolution)

components.name: RGB LED (Color Changing LED)
components.description: A multi-colored LED that can emit different colors by adjusting the intensity of its red, green, and blue components.
